      • prepareVdc

        public void prepareVdc()
        prepare the vdc to fulfill the requirement of being able to add other vdc in this one. tasks are: 1. remove root's roles from all tenants 2. remove root's ownership from all projects

        API Call: POST /vdc/prepare-vdc
